typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string,
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SourceBlobDefinitivPayRuns
SourceBlobDefinitivPayRuns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> SinkSqlDefinitiv
